short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with friends across the internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Buddies adds chat, comments, and friends to any web page.

1. Track your activity across tabs. The extension shows your current tabs, when you opened them, and how long they've been open.

2. You can opt to make your browing activity public. Use fine-grained controls to share or block specific domains. For example, share your activity on Netflix, and hide your activity on Gmail.

3. You can interact with others on the same web page through our side panel. Within the panel, there is chat, comments, and a feed of your friends' and your activity.

Join us, and bring your friends!
